name: Abandoned Choose Your Own Adventure (2007)
description:
I wrote this story in 2007 when I was in college. At some point I thought about converting it to a Twine story but that seemed like a lot of work and I'm probably never going to come back to it and fix all the dead links.

This was all like two years before Twine even existed, so it's all in HTML and it was a lot of work to do. Hopefully it displays fine in itch here.

It's pretty big and there are a ton of dead ends that were never written. So if you hit one, well, sorry.

There used to be some drawings by my old friend Jessica (https://twitter.com/my2k), for this too but they have long been lost. C'est la vie.

The story map is to the right, look at this mess.
